Text:
If you find  virus/trojan take a look here :
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6554967/Runespell.Overture.v1.0.cracked-THETA

It's a false positive triggered by the THETA uninstaller, and deemed safe.

easy virus fix in vista:

boot recovery-goto command prompt

bootrec.exe /fixmbr
bootrec.exe /fixboot
bootrec.exe /scanos
bootrec.exe /rebuildbcd

blam completely undone!

yes... Runespell.Overture!
this game looks really fun, thank betadoctor
